Package csw.messages.params.formats

Interface DerivedJsonFormats

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonSupport$

    public interface DerivedJsonFormats
    Derived Json formats to be used by play-json library. For scala, the library does not support character so a custom implementation is provided. All the java datatype formats are mapped onto their corresponding scala datatypes.
